title: Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour
description:
Cruise through San Francisco and admire all that this diverse city has to offer atop a double-decker bus. Relish full 360-degree views of the city and enjoy unlimited rides within the validity of your ticket. Hop on and off at iconic sights including Pier 39, Golden Gate Park, and Union Square.

Sit back and enjoy the extensive ride, as the route takes you around the city. Hop on and off as you wish and explore for as little or as long as you like. As you pass the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, take in the awe-inspiring views and then browse through the vibrant Union Square and visit Golden Gate Park—one of the most visited parks in the US. Also, get your legs moving and uncover the city by bike with a 1-hour bicycle rental.

Your ticket includes 3 walking tours, as well. On the Chinatown Tour see the Chinatown gates and the delightful mix of historical and modern culture. Join the North Beach Tour as you follow your guide through Little Italy. The Barbary Coast Tour takes you through the infamous neighborhood as you learn about San Francisco's economic ups and downs.

With your 48-hour ticket, you can embark on the Night Tour—see San Francisco illuminated at night and admire panoramic vistas of the glittering city. Discover the charms of a Mediterranean town on the Sausalito Tour. You can also take a ride on an exclusive 7D experience, with 3D graphics, motion seats, and laser blasters.

Route includes:

  • Washington Square
  • Union Square
  • Golden Gate Bridge
  • Golden Gate Park
  • Chinatown

highlights: Guided bus tour & walking tour in Chinatown
Route including North Beach, Golden Gate Park & Union Square
No limit to the number of times you can hop on & off
Freedom to explore the city at your own pace
inclusions: Hop-on hop-off bus tour of San Francisco
Unlimited rides within the duration of your ticket
Headset for tour commentary in English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Korean, Portuguese, Japanese, Cantonese, and Mandarin Chinese
fullName: San Francisco (and vicinity), California, United States of America

offers.title: 1-Day Ticket
offers.description: Includes 1-day bus ticket for the day route, 3 walking tours, and 1-hour bicycle rental.

offers.title: 2-Day Ticket
offers.description: Includes 2-day bus ticket for day route, night tour and Sausalito Tour, 3 walking tours, 1-hour bicycle rental, and 1 ride at the 7D Experience. Book and travel before the 29th February and receive a complementary additional day.

offers.title: 1-Day Bay Explorer Ticket
offers.description: Includes 1-day bus ticket for the day route and the Sausalito Tour, 3 walking tours, 24-hour bicycle rental, Sausalito ferry ticket.
